channel.title: Vistex v2
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]FAN OF VISTEX? CHECK OUT OUR CURRENT PROJECT:[/b][/size] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,594169.msg4188270.html#msg4188270]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,594169.msg4188270.html#msg4188270[/url]
[CENTER] [URL=http://"http://vistexforums.com/community/showthread.php?2-Download-Links"][IMG]http://oi39.tinypic.com/34dm06g.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://vistexforums.com/community/showthread.php?2-Download-Links"][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2hnx1xj.png[/img][/URL] [B][U]Vistex Version 2[/U][/B]
Credits: [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=529576"]Myself[/URL] [URL=http://"http://google.com/members/reader/"]Matrix/Stefano[/URL]
Vistex eco had a good run. However because of some bastard people who lied and stole my source, I decided to release and make a spawn server. You can check it out ^.^ This server was created by myself and Stefano (Matrix). Huge thanks to him, because without him, Vistex wouldn't be Vistex.
[U][B]Features:[/B][/U]
[code]*Perfect Hitsplats *All Weapon Specials 100% *Domination Tower *Bount Hunter *Perfect Combat *New Items *Perfect Switching *Dicing *Perfect Clan Chat *Many Bosses - Nomad, Bork, Corp etc.. *Skillcapes *Achievements *Player Panels *Money Pouch *Exp Counter *VPS Hosted *24/7 Uptime *KillStreak System *Loyalty Titles *Curses 100% *Plenty Of Shops *No Nulled Models *Player Owned Shops *Donator Zones *Many Gambling Npcs *Webclient *Korasi *Many Pk Areas *All Spirit Shield Effects *A lot More... [/code]
[U][B]Media:[/B][/U]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kVb_7oH2HtQ&context=C390955eADOEgsToPDskJj6sL1vjvE-_HjfM7GZZO_]Vistex Promo - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVdygEbBa28&feature=youtu.be]Vistex Features - YouTube[/url] [url=http://youtu.be/Y3a2veMjJrE]Vistex - Jad, Quick Prayers, & Barb Mini - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BT8hwX6IuXY]Vistex No Lagg - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uLnIIV5U3N0]Random Pk'ing - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4INZedb7X0]Pk Video - YouTube[/url]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/wqy1ih.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/bh0dts.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/o05h01.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/34edxj9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10ydvrl.png[/img] [IMG]http://oi43.tinypic.com/30n7j8h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi44.tinypic.com/2cdizp3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hLOmS.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2AVg3.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2poqemu.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tnson.gif?1[/img]
[U]Downloads:[/U] [url=http://www.vistexforums.com/]http://www.vistexforums.com/[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/i70cgr8tuvlh/Vistex_Server_By_Legend_&_Matrix.rar]http://uppit.com/i70cgr8tuvlh/Vistex_Server_By_Legend_&_Matrix.rar[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/6g14quomx3k2/VistexCacheV1.rar]http://uppit.com/6g14quomx3k2/VistexCacheV1.rar[/url]
*NOTES*
There are no anti leeches. If you use please thank and repp. [/center]
